name: essentials-claude-code
description: Multi-agent orchestration framework for Claude Code. Three workflows: Simple (plan → implement-loop/swarm), Tasks (plan → prd.json → tasks-loop/swarm), Beads (plan → beads → beads-loop/swarm). Uses Claude Code's built-in Task System for dependency tracking and parallel execution.
author: GantisStorm

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: 16 commands, 10 agents. Three workflows: Simple, Tasks, Beads. Each task/bead is 100% self-contained (50-200+ lines of code). RalphTUI integration for TUI dashboard. LSP-powered code analysis via Claude Code built-in LSP.
